# AVCaption.Ruby

**Class**

An object that presents ruby characters.

## Declaration

```swift
class Ruby
```

## Overview

Ruby characters are small annotations, typically used in Japanese content, that render alongside the base text.

## Creating Ruby text

- **init(text:)**: Creates ruby text.
- **init(text:position:alignment:)**: Creates ruby text with position and alignment.

## Accessing text properties

- **text**: The ruby text.
- **position**: The ruby text position.
- **AVCaptionRubyPosition**: Constants that indicate ruby text positions.
- **alignment**: The ruby text alignment.
- **AVCaptionRubyAlignment**: Constants that indicate ruby text alignments.

## Accessing advanced typography

- **ruby(at:)**: Returns the ruby text at the index position.
- **textCombine(at:)**: Returns the text combine at the index position.
- **AVCaption.TextCombine**: The caption’s supported rendering policy options.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
